question: You are getting married later this year. You want to invite yourfriend to the wedding.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter● tell your friend that you are getting married● tell them when and where the wedding will take place● ask them to help you prepare for the wedding in some way
text: How are you doing? I presume you are good and okay. Do you remember David ? during, our time in school years ago.

I am happy to tell you that he proposed to me last week  and our wedding is coming up on the 5th of July, 2022. Here in Kaligo town. It will be a thing of joy for me to see you as my own buddy at my event.

And please I will also want you to assist me with organising the function. For instance, with the cake, my dress and cooking  here in Kaligo they don't really have a good baker and seamstress because it is a small community and I shall send you the kind of design I want for my day through whatsapp app.
Hope to hear from you soon and please send my love to your siblings. Much love always.
